definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The control-room listened carefully and then advised the astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 控制室仔細地聽着，然後給宇航員提出忠告。

sentences.english: A 24-hour control room is established in NICD.
sentences.chinese: 在國立傳染病研究所設立了一個24小時控制室。

sentences.english: There is a control room with switchers and controllers .
sentences.chinese: 有一個控制室與交換機和控制器。

sentences.english: The director hurried down from the control room.
sentences.chinese: 導演急忙從控制室走了下來。

sentences.english: The main control point of the plant looks bit small if being compared to its contemorary brothers on the modern power plants.
sentences.chinese: 與新核電站的相比，老核電站的主控制室略微小些。

sentences.english: We also have different types of control rooms.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有不同種類的控制室。

sentences.english: We are now in the control room.
Gauges in the control room erroneously indicate that the water level is up.
sentences.chinese: 控制室中的儀表誤報水位在上升。

sentences.english: All control equipment should be located in the furnace control room .
sentences.chinese: 所有的控制設備都應當裝在窯爐控制室裏。

sentences.english: MER was in a building adjacent to the Mission Control building.
sentences.chinese: 任務評估室在緊鄰任務控制室的一幢建築裏。

sentences.english: Hello, this is MCC, please send the daily report to me.
sentences.chinese: 你好，這是中心控制室，請把日報表送給我。

sentences.english: The light lit again, and again, each time a little closer to the control room.
sentences.chinese: 燈閃了一下又一下，每次都離控制室更近些。

sentences.english: This center controls the work of controllers and switchboards etc.
sentences.chinese: 中心控制室，控制交換機和控制器等設備的工作。

sentences.english: You are in a control room.
sentences.chinese: 你目前所在的地點是控制室。

sentences.english: Important incidents occulting in station or system should be announced to all control rooms by the shift engineer in charge.
sentences.chinese: 值長應將電廠或系統發生的事故通告所有的控制室。

definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane
aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
